channel.title: CannerIO (alpha) Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest CannerIO (alpha) news and events.

item.title: CannerIO 2.0 & Open source Canner
item.description:
Today, our team at Canner, Inc. is thrilled to announce our CannerIO 2.0 alpha version and Open source Canner alpha is now release! ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ This is our biggest release so far! ðŸ¤¡

What's new?

Everything in CannerIO 2.0 is new! We redesign almost everything! But don't worry we support all previous versions!

Here's an overview of the major changes pricing, UI & UX redesign, CMS framework redesign, Open source, Standalone login page, New documentation website.

In this post, we are going through the details of this release!
